section.p: The operator can specify default attributes for group as mentioned in the following table.

If group is specified in the template, then the group is added in the list of groups in the device created during the unknown call. Also if Attach to Group parameter is true in the sub-template, then the provisioned subscription is attached to this.

entry.p: This parameter indicates the name of the group.
If no group is assigned, the NCC system assigns a unique ID. If the group is specified, then it must be available in the system.

row.entry: This parameter indicates the traversal order of hierarchy.

entry.p: This parameter indicates the name of the lifecycle that you want add to the group.
This enables to add custom data dictionary to the group.
Click ADD CUSTOM DATA to add custom data to the group.

row.entry: This parameter indicates the name of a custom data pre-configured in the custom data dictionary.
This parameter indicates the type that is not configurable and pre-configured in the custom data dictionary.
This parameter indicates the value for the type configured.
